author: Rod
content: " I’m terribly tired though, I guess I’ll have some sleep. "  I don't like the sound of that.  I'm a nurse in a small ICU, and that has an ominous ring to it---sorry, don't mean to sound so dark.  It may just be that you've lost a lot of sleep getting your new blog up and running, but stay alert to how you "feel".  As Mike J. would say----I'm just saying.  Take care.
